objects.description: [Marcher](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0317) is delivered via a link sent by SMS or email, including instructions advising the user to modify their Android device security settings to enable apps to be installed from "Unknown Sources."(Citation: Proofpoint-Marcher)

external_references.description: Proofpoint. (2017, November 3). Credential phishing and an Android banking Trojan combine in Austrian mobile attacks. Retrieved July 6, 2018.
